title: Transfer Inventory Between Warehouses
description: To balance stock, a logistics manager needs to process an inventory transfer of 50 units of a product from the West Coast warehouse to the East Coast warehouse.

tasks.description: Decrement the inventory count for the product by 50 at the West Coast warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reduces the stock level at the source.

tasks.description: Create an 'in-transit' inventory record for the 50 units.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the stock as in-transit, so it's not available for sale.

tasks.description: Upon arrival, receive the stock and increment the inventory count by 50 at the East Coast warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent increases the stock level at the destination and removes the in-transit record.
